page.title: 18OUTDOOR RECREATION, HEMEL
page.content: {Gadebridge Park}is the main open air area where events like the Round Table Spring Bank Holiday Fair, the August Fair & Carnival and play days (in June and July) take place. There are also facilities for {putting, bowls}and{outdoor chess}and a {childrens' playground}with a{paddling {pool.}"Pond dipping" is done in the shallow River Gade. Gadebridge Park is a popular{picnic spot}for family outings. Each neighbourhood has good{playing {fields,}for football etc, provided by the New Towns Commission. There are also several{children's parks}in the area. In Grovehill there is a{BMX track which is very popular with local young people. Dacorum Council provides a few public{tennis courts.
